\subsection*{Opiates Junkie}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Notorious K.I.D.}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &   &  & Pharms - Buprenorphine & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 190.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
dose: 32mg-24hrs



This stuff saved my ass. I was snorting 600mg or more of Oxycontin ever day. Then I wanted to get clean and went to a doctor here in town. He put me on this med and I was able to avoid 98\% of the typical withdrawls. THANK GOD.



Peace
